about.title: About AI Town Lab
about.description: AI Town Lab is operated by Velocentra CO, focusing on AI image and video generation technology
about.keywords: AI Town Lab,Velocentra,AI image generation,AI video creation,about us
about.subtitle: Operated by Velocentra CO
about.operatedBy: AI Town Lab is an AI creative platform by Velocentra CO

intro.title: Company Introduction
intro.content: Velocentra CO is an AI technology company that values speed and power. Our name derives from 'Velocity' and 'Centra', representing our commitment to being the speed center in AI creation. Our product AI Town Lab focuses on AI image and video generation, providing creators with fast and professional AI creative tools.

models.title: Top AI Models
models.content: Integrating industry-leading AI models including Google Veo 3.1, OpenAI Sora 2, Nano Banana, and GPT-4o to ensure professional-grade generation quality.

image.title: Professional Image Generation
image.content: Supporting various image generation scenarios, from professional avatars to creative design, offering high-quality and diverse image generation capabilities.

video.title: High-Quality Video Creation
video.content: Multiple modes including text-to-video and image-to-video, quickly generating high-quality video content to meet various creative needs.

avatars.title: AI Professional Avatars
avatars.content: Quickly transform selfies into high-quality professional portraits, suitable for LinkedIn, resumes, ID photos, and more.

images.title: AI Image Creation
images.content: Powerful image generation capabilities supporting text-to-image and image-to-image modes, meeting needs from commercial design to personal creation.

videos.title: AI Video Production
videos.content: Utilizing the latest AI video generation technology to quickly create high-quality video content with various aspect ratios and duration options.

scenarios.title: Multi-Scenario Support
scenarios.content: Covering professional portraits, social media, creative design, marketing, and more application scenarios in one integrated platform.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: Making AI creation accessible to everyone, empowering every creator. We believe technology should serve creativity, not limit it. Through continuous innovation, we're committed to breaking creative boundaries and making creative dreams achievable for everyone.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us anytime

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: AI Town Lab Privacy Policy - Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information
privacy.subtitle: AI Town Lab (operated by Velocentra CO)
privacy.intro: Welcome to AI Town Lab. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your data. By using our services, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.intro: To provide our services, we collect the following types of information:

account.title: Account Information
account.content: Basic information such as email address and username provided during registration.

uploads.title: Uploaded Content
uploads.content: Images and video files you upload for AI generation.

payment.title: Payment Information
payment.content: Payment data processed through Stripe. We do not directly store complete credit card information.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.content: Technical information including log files, IP addresses, browser type, and access times.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.service: Provide, maintain, and improve AI image and video generation services
usage.improvement: Analyze usage patterns to optimize product features and user experience
usage.payment: Process payment transactions and manage subscriptions
usage.communication: Send service-related notifications, updates, and marketing information (opt-out available)
usage.security: Detect and prevent fraud, abuse, or security threats

platform.title: Storage Platform
platform.content: We use Supabase as our primary data storage platform with industry-standard security measures.

retention.title: Uploaded Image Retention
retention.content: Original uploaded images are automatically deleted within 24 hours after AI processing.

generated.title: Generated Content
generated.content: AI-generated images and videos are permanently saved in your account unless you choose to delete them.

security.title: Security Measures
security.content: All data transmission uses HTTPS encryption, and stored data is protected with encryption.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: We use the following third-party services to provide complete functionality:
thirdParty.stripe: Securely processes payment transactions in compliance with PCI DSS standards
thirdParty.aiProviders: Google (Veo), OpenAI (Sora), Replicate, and others provide AI model services
thirdParty.supabase: Provides secure database and storage services

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
cookies.auth: Maintain your login session and authentication
cookies.preferences: Save your user preferences and language selection
cookies.analytics: Analyze website usage to improve our services

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR/CCPA)
rights.intro: Under privacy laws such as GDPR and CCPA, you have the following rights:

access.title: Right to Access
access.content: Request to view your personal data we hold

deletion.title: Right to Deletion
deletion.content: Request deletion of your account and related data

export.title: Data Portability
export.content: Request to export a copy of your data

marketing.title: Marketing Opt-Out
marketing.content: Unsubscribe from marketing emails at any time

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.content: Request correction of inaccurate personal information

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are intended for users aged 18 and above. We do not knowingly collect personal information from individuals under 18. If we discover we have collected data from minors, we will delete it immediately.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated via email or website announcement. Continued use of the service indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your privacy rights, please contact:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: AI Town Lab Terms of Service - Understand the rules and rights of using our services
terms.subtitle: AI Town Lab (operated by Velocentra CO)
terms.intro: Welcome to AI Town Lab! These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Velocentra CO. By using our services, you agree to comply with these terms. Please read carefully.

service.title: Service Description
service.description: AI Town Lab provides the following services:
service.image: AI image generation services including professional avatars, creative design, etc.
service.video: AI video creation services supporting text-to-video and image-to-video
service.models: Integration of multiple top-tier AI models (Google Veo, OpenAI Sora, Nano Banana, etc.)
service.availability: Services are based on subscription and credit models. We do not guarantee 100% service availability

account.title: Account Responsibilities
account.age: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services
account.security: You are responsible for maintaining the security and confidentiality of your account
account.sharing: Account credential sharing or allowing others to use your account is prohibited
account.accuracy: You are responsible for ensuring the information provided is accurate and up-to-date

processor.title: Payment Processing
processor.content: All payments are securely processed through Stripe in compliance with PCI DSS standards

subscription.title: Automatic Renewal
subscription.content: Subscription plans automatically renew unless canceled before the end of the billing cycle. You will receive renewal reminders

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.content: Refund requests are handled on a case-by-case basis. Please contact customer service to discuss your specific situation

credits.title: Credits Rules
credits.content: Purchased credits never expire but are non-refundable. Credits can be used for all generation services

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.intro: You agree not to use the service for the following purposes:
usage.illegal: Generating illegal, violent, pornographic, or harmful content
usage.impersonation: Impersonating others or misleadingly representing relationships with others
usage.infringement: Infringing on others' copyrights, trademarks, portrait rights, or other intellectual property
usage.abuse: Abusing system resources or attempting to disrupt normal service operations
usage.harmful: Generating content that may cause discrimination, harassment, or harm

uploads.title: Uploaded Content
uploads.content: You retain all rights to your uploaded content

generated.title: Generated Content
generated.content: AI-generated content copyright belongs to you, and you are free to use it

commercial.title: Commercial Use
commercial.content: You may use generated content for any commercial or personal purpose

showcase.title: Showcase Rights
showcase.content: We reserve the right to showcase excellent works for marketing and product improvement (with your explicit consent)

changes.title: Service Changes and Termination
changes.features: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate any features or services at any time
changes.pricing: Prices and plans may be adjusted; significant changes will be communicated to existing users in advance
changes.termination: Accounts violating the terms of service may be suspended or terminated without notice

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.aiQuality: AI generation quality may vary due to multiple factors; we do not guarantee perfect output
disclaimer.responsibility: You are fully responsible for how you use generated content and its consequences
disclaimer.thirdParty: Third-party AI service provider limitations may affect service performance
disclaimer.asIs: Services are provided 'as is' without any express or implied warranties

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Velocentra CO shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data loss, or business interruption.

law.title: Governing Law
law.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the relevant jurisdiction

negotiation.title: Negotiated Resolution
negotiation.content: Any disputes should first be resolved through amicable negotiation

termsChanges.title: Changes to Terms
termsChanges.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated via email or website announcement. Continued use of the service indicates acceptance of the updated terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact:

terms.acceptance: By using AI Town Lab, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
